title: Green printers
content:
I know there was a recent thread on various (certified?) green printers around the US, but I can’t for the life of me find it. I’m not sure if I’m not searching the right way, or what... Anyway, can anyone please point me in the right direction?

Thanks!

 [‹ Helvetica Film on BBC 1 tonight (Tuesday)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107040416/http:/typophile.com/node/38856 "Go to previous forum topic") [Exceptional printer? Submit your best printers; environmental / green printers, letterpress, offset, digital printing, etc. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071107040416/http:/typophile.com/node/37376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Cassie
